data.trans_hint: Cha tôi là một bác sĩ, ông làm việc ở bệnh viện địa phương từ khi tôi còn nhỏ.
data.en_hint: My father is a doctor, he has worked at the local hospital since I was small.
data.content_game_1: My father is a doctor, he has worked at the local hospital since I was small.
data.answer_en_hint: My father is a doctor, he has worked at the local hospital since I was small.

data.trans_hint: Mẹ tôi là một giáo viên, và bà cũng dạy tôi rất nhiều thứ ở nhà.
data.en_hint: My mother is a teacher, she also taught me a lot at home.
data.content_game_1: My mother is a teacher, she also taught me a lot at home.
data.answer_en_hint: My mother is a teacher, she also taught me a lot at home.

data.trans_hint: Con trai của anh ấy còn nhỏ, anh ấy muốn nuôi dạy nó trở thành một người đàn ông tốt.
data.en_hint: His son is small, he wants to raise him into a good man.
data.content_game_1: His son is small, he wants to raise him into a good man.
data.answer_en_hint: His son is small, he wants to raise him into a good man.

data.trans_hint: Con gái của anh ấy là một học sinh xuất sắc, cô bé được sinh ra vào 15 năm trước.
data.en_hint: His daughter is a brilliant student, she was born 15 years ago.
data.content_game_1: His daughter is a brilliant student, she was born 15 years ago.
data.answer_en_hint: His daughter is a brilliant student, she was born 15 years ago.

data.trans_hint: Cha mẹ cô ấy sống ở nông thôn, cô không ở với họ nữa kể từ khi học đại học.
data.en_hint: Her parents live in the countryside, she has not stayed with them since university.
data.content_game_1: Her parents live in the countryside, she has not stayed with them since university.
data.answer_en_hint: Her parents live in the countryside, she has not stayed with them since university.

data.trans_hint: Chồng cô ấy rất đẹp trai, họ gặp và yêu nhau 5 năm trước.
data.en_hint: Her husband is very handsome, they met and fell in love 5 years ago.
data.content_game_1: Her husband is very handsome, they met and fell in love 5 years ago.
data.answer_en_hint: Her husband is very handsome, they met and fell in love 5 years ago.

data.trans_hint: Vợ của anh ấy rất đẹp, cô ấy kết hôn với anh ta 5 năm trước.
data.en_hint: His wife is very beautiful, she married him 5 years ago.
data.content_game_1: His wife is very beautiful, she married him 5 years ago.
data.answer_en_hint: His wife is very beautiful, she married him 5 years ago.

data.trans_hint: Anh trai tôi đang học ở nước ngoài, anh ấy là người anh em ruột duy nhất của tôi.
data.en_hint: My brother is studying abroad, he is my only sibling.
data.content_game_1: My brother is studying abroad, he is my only sibling.
data.answer_en_hint: My brother is studying abroad, he is my only sibling.

data.trans_hint: Em gái tôi 7 tuổi, đó là người anh chị em ruột duy nhất của tôi.
data.en_hint: My sister is 7 years old, she is my only sibling.
data.content_game_1: My sister is 7 years old, she is my only sibling.
data.answer_en_hint: My sister is 7 years old, she is my only sibling.

data.trans_hint: Chú của anh ấy là một giáo sư, đó là em trai của bố anh ấy.
data.en_hint: His uncle is a professor, he is the brother of his father.
data.content_game_1: His uncle is a professor, he is the brother of his father.
data.answer_en_hint: His uncle is a professor, he is the brother of his father.
